source:
BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR = "abfss://data-integration@sasynwpdlintnpdeve201.dfs.core.windows.net/"
SOURCE_LAKE_STORE_ORDER_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/order/store-order/lake/2023-07-12-11-02-15"
STAGE_STORE_ORDER_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/order/store-order/stage/order/"
STAGE_STORE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/order/store-order/stage/order-header/"
STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/order/store-order/stage/order-item/"
TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/order/store-order/master/order/"
STAGE_CUSTOMER_LYLTY_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/customer/user/stage/loyalty-card/"
TARGET_CUSTOMER_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/customer/user/master/"
KEY_COL = ["order_num"]
PARTITION_COLS = ["year", "month", "day"]

logger.info(" \033[1m****************************************************************************** \n MDM - ORDER - STORE_ORDER - SHOPPING_HISTORY - Starting with below parameters\n *****************************************************************************\033[0m")
logger.info("\n SOURCE_LAKE_STORE_ORDER_PATH : {0}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_STORE_ORDER_PATH))
logger.info("\n STAGE_STORE_ORDER_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_STORE_ORDER_PATH))
logger.info("\n STAGE_STORE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_STORE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH))
logger.info("\n STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH))
logger.info("\n TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH))
logger.info("\n STAGE_CUSTOMER_LYLTY_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_CUSTOMER_LYLTY_PATH))
logger.info("\n TARGET_CUSTOMER_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_CUSTOMER_PATH))
logger.info("\n KEY_COLS : {0}".format(KEY_COLS))
logger.info("\n PARTITION_COLS : {0}".format(PARTITION_COLS))
logger.info("**************************************************************************")

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_PATH)):
    mssparkutils.fs.rm(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_PATH, recurse = True)
    logger.info("cleanup : purging stage container")


df_store_order_lake = spark \
    .read \
    .format("parquet") \
    .option("inferSchema", "true") \
    .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + SOURCE_LAKE_STORE_ORDER_PATH) \
    .filter("transaction_ts is not NULL") \
    .withColumn('transaction_ts',f.from_unixtime(f.col("transaction_ts")/1000, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) \
    .withColumn("order_num", f.col("transaction_id")) \
    .withColumn("year", f.year(f.col("transaction_ts"))) \
    .withColumn("month", f.month(f.col("transaction_ts"))) \
    .withColumn("day", f.dayofmonth(f.col("transaction_ts")))

logger.info("stage-load : Load store shopping history from lake path. Count={0}, Path={1}".format(df_store_order_lake.count(), SOURCE_LAKE_STORE_ORDER_PATH))

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql import types as t
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_CUSTOMER_PATH)):
    df_customer_master = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_CUSTOMER_PATH) \
        .filter("rtlr_card_id IS NOT NULL AND rtlr_card_id_wo_chk_dgt IS NOT NULL") \
        .withColumn("hash", f.abs(f.hash(f.col("rtlr_card_id_wo_chk_dgt"))%25)) \
        .select(f.col("user_id"), f.col("rtlr_card_id"), f.col("rtlr_card_id_wo_chk_dgt"), f.col("hash")) \
    
    df_customer_master \
        .repartition(5, f.col("rtlr_card_id_wo_chk_dgt")) \
        .sort(f.col("rtlr_card_id_wo_chk_dgt")) \
        .write \
        .format("delta") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .partitionBy("hash") \
        .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_CUSTOMER_LYLTY_PATH)
    logger.info("user-lookup: Loaded customer master data. Count={0}, Path={1}".format(df_customer_master.count(), STAGE_CUSTOMER_LYLTY_PATH))

    df_customer_lylty = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_CUSTOMER_LYLTY_PATH)
    
    df_store_order_lake_with_lylty = df_store_order_lake \
        .filter("loyalty_id IS NOT NULL") \
        .withColumn("hash", f.abs(f.hash(f.col("loyalty_id").cast("string"))%25))

    df_customer_lylty.createOrReplaceTempView("tbl_customer_master")
    df_store_order_lake_with_lylty.createOrReplaceTempView("tbl_store_order_with_lylty")

    df_store_order_with_usrid = spark.sql(
        """
        SELECT 
             str_ord.*
            ,cus.user_id as user_id
        FROM tbl_store_order_with_lylty as str_ord
        LEFT JOIN tbl_customer_master as cus
        ON str_ord.hash = cus.hash
        AND str_ord.loyalty_id = cus.rtlr_card_id_wo_chk_dgt
        """) \
        .drop("hash")
    
    logger.info("user-lookup: looked up user-id. Lake={0}, Match={1}".format(df_store_order_lake_with_lylty.count(), df_store_order_with_usrid.count()))

    df_store_order_no_usrid = df_store_order_lake \
    .filter("loyalty_id IS NULL") \
    .withColumn("user_id", f.lit(None).cast(t.LongType())) 

    df_store_order_stage = df_store_order_no_usrid \
        .unionByName(df_store_order_with_usrid, allowMissingColumns=True)

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType, LongType, DoubleType, DecimalType, BooleanType, DateType, ArrayType

trans_lines_schema = ArrayType(StructType([
    StructField("line_item_id", IntegerType(), True), 
    StructField("upc_nbr", StringType(), True), 
    StructField("qty_sld_amt", IntegerType(), True), 
    StructField("pod_id", IntegerType(), True), 
    StructField("item_mvp_savings", StringType(), True),
    StructField("ext_sell_prc_amt", StringType(), True), 
    StructField("item_rewardsprogram_savings", StringType(), True), 
    StructField("item_coupon_savings", StringType(), True) ])) 

df_store_order_stage = df_store_order_stage.withColumn("transaction_lines", f.from_json(f.col("transaction_lines"), trans_lines_schema))

logger.info("to_json : converting transaction_line from string to json. Count={0}".format(df_store_order_stage.count())

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

def init():
    df_store_order_stage \
        .repartition(5, KEY_COL) \
        .sort(KEY_COL) \
        .write \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .option("mergeSchema", "true") \
        .format("delta") \
        .partitionBy(PARTITION_COLS) \
        .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH)
    logger.info("init-load : shopping history loaded into master. Count={0}, Path={1}".format(df_store_order_stage.count(), TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH))


def apply_cdc():
    df_store_order_stage \
        .repartition(5, KEY_COL) \
        .sort(KEY_COL) \
        .write \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .format("delta") \
        .partitionBy(PARTITION_COLS) \
        .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_PATH)

    df_store_order_master = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH)

    df_store_order_delta = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_PATH) 

    df_store_order_master.createOrReplaceTempView('tbl_store_order_mstr')
    df_store_order_delta.createOrReplaceTempView('tbl_store_order_delta')

    spark.sql(
        """
        MERGE INTO tbl_store_order_mstr
        USING tbl_store_order_delta
        ON tbl_store_order_mstr.year = tbl_store_order_delta.year
        AND tbl_store_order_mstr.month = tbl_store_order_delta.month
        AND tbl_store_order_mstr.day = tbl_store_order_delta.day
        AND tbl_store_order_mstr.order_num = tbl_store_order_delta.order_num
        WHEN MATCHED THEN 
            UPDATE SET *
        WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
            INSERT *
        """
    )
    logger.info("cdc-load : shopping history loaded into master. Master_Count={0}, Delta_Count={1}, Path={2}".format(df_store_order_master.count(), df_store_order_delta.count(), TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH))

##############################
# FULL LOAD / DELTA LOAD
##############################
if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH) == False):
    init()
else:
    apply_cdc()

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from delta.tables import DeltaTable 

def emit_events():
    df_store_order_stage = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_PATH) \
        .select("order_num", "year", "month", "day") \
        .distinct()

    df_store_order_stage \
        .repartition(5,"order_num") \
        .sort("order_num") \
        .write \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .format("delta") \
        .partitionBy("year", "month", "day") \
        .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH)

    df_store_order_stage \
        .repartition(5, "order_num") \
        .sort("order_num") \
        .write \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .format("delta") \
        .partitionBy("year", "month", "day") \
        .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH)
    logger.info("emit_events : shopping history events emitted to order-header & order-item.Count={0}, Header={1}, Item={2}".format(df_store_order_stage.count(), STAGE_STORE_ORDER_HEADER_PATH, STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH))

def purge_stage():
    mssparkutils.fs.rm(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_PATH, recurse = True)
    logger.info("purge: stage data has been cleaned at path={0}".format(STAGE_STORE_ORDER_PATH))

if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_PATH)):
    emit_events()
    purge_stage()
else:
    logger.info("emit_events : No delta found to emit events")
